baseRule.text: Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannaṁ padaso dhammaṁ vāceyya, pācittiyaṁ.
baseRule.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 4

translations.text: Welcher Mönch auch immer eine nicht-hochordinierte Person rezitieren lehrt, indem er eine Lehrrede in Zeilen einteilt und {gemeinsam mit ihr} rezitiert, muß dafür sühnen.
If a monk instructs a person who is not fully ordained to memorize the Teaching, he commits an offense entailing confession.
Si un bhikkhu hace que [enseña a] una persona no ordenada recite el Dhamma línea por línea [con él]: [La acción] ha de ser confesada

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。以闡陀偈句。教未受具戒人者。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 6

fullParallels.text: 若比丘以闡陀偈句。教未受具戒人者。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 6

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻與未近圓人。同句讀誦教授法者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 6

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。教未受具戒人經並誦者。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 6

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。教未受具戒人說句法。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Pācittiya 6

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！與未受大戒人共誦者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 6

translations.text: If a monk chant prayers with a man not yet ordained, it is Pācittiya.
Jika seorang bhikṣu membaca Prātimokṣa Sūtra bersama dengan seseorang yang belum menerima penahbisan penuh, ia melakukan sebuah pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘與未受具戒人同誦者波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 6

fullParallels.text: 若比丘與未受具戒人同誦。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Kāśyapīya Bhikkhu Pācittiya 6

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī anupasampannaṁ padaso dhammaṁ vāceyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 100

translations.text: Welche Nonne auch immer eine nicht-hochordinierte Person rezitieren lehrt, indem sie eine Lehrrede in Zeilen einteilt und {gemeinsam mit ihr} rezitiert, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni have an unordained person recite Dhamma line by line (with her), it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang setelah seorang yang belum di tahbiskan membacakan Dhamma bait demi bait (bersamanya), itu harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，與未受具戒人共誦法者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 6

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼教未受具戒女人經。並誦者。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 6

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。以句法教未受具戒人者。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 5

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼與未近圓人同句讀誦。及教授法者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 6

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。教未受具戒人說句法波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 6
